title: [HOLD for payment 2023-10-24] [$500] Settings - Notification preferences and Who can post doesn't highlight when selected
issue_repo_steps:

2. Go to a #announce room
3. Click header => Settings
4. Click "Notify me about new messages", Observe that the selected item is not highlighted

Expected result: Selected item is highlighted

Actual result: None
